signatures.text: fun CharSequence.windowed( size: Int, step: Int = 1, partialWindows: Boolean = false): List<String>
signatures.desc: Returns a list of snapshots of the window of the given size sliding along this char sequence with the given step, where each snapshot is a string.

signatures.text: fun <R> CharSequence.windowed( size: Int, step: Int = 1, partialWindows: Boolean = false, transform: (CharSequence) -> R): List<R>
signatures.desc: Returns a list of results of applying the given transform function to an each char sequence representing a view over the window of the given size sliding along this char sequence with the given step.
